title: Pyramid
description: Forward bends, Inversions, Standing Primary body parts engaged Hamstrings, Shoulders, Spine Stretches hamstrings and shoulders Stimulates abdominal organs Improves balance, calms mind How to perform Pyramid Begin standing. Step your left foot about 3 feet back with an exhale. Keeping your heels in one line, point your left foot 45 degrees to the left. Face your torso forward. Press your palms together behind your back with an inhale. Open your chest. Bend forward with an exhale. Reach your forehead toward your knee.
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
